name: Untime
description:
SYNOPSIS

You have been captured by sentient robots to fight for their entertainment for years on end. Fight drone and survive both in the present and future!

CONTROLS
  • WASD to move
  • Left Click to shoot
  • Right Click to TIME TRAVEL
  • ESC to pause
TECHNICAL CHALLENGE

The main villain is a malevolent robot that interacts with the player during the game and reacts to their actions. The game also feature 3 different types of drones that track the player.

ASSETS

All assets aside from the font, sound effects and music are custom made.

  • Public Pixel font: https://www.dafont.com/fr/public-pixel.font
  • Sound and music:
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/weapons/post-apocalypse-gun...
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/arcade-sfx-free-42983
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-retro-sfx-pack-43256
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/electronic/free-music-bundle-b...
